title: Most satisfying thing in the game?
body:
Just wondering.

For me, its one shotting Teemo with a Veigar ult.

replies.body: Having a polite and respectful team regardless if we're winning or losing.
The most satisfying thing _in the game_. That's not a thing that happens in this game.

I can one-up that.

Having a polite and respectful *enemy team* that shuts down the ragers when they start screaming in /All chat.

Also Poppy, Elise, Olaf, Akali, Katarina and *shudder* YORICK!

Two of those champions have been complained about more than Leblanc overall. 
Four of those champions have at some point been left intentionally weak because they have design issues. Excluding Urgot aren't those the only four champions that have ever needed that?

I never understood the hate lee gets. He's not that strong. 

I think he's been balanced for a long time now. At least I haven't had any qualms about him for a couple years now.

Oh I have no problem playing against him I don't wanna play WITH him as he always just puts in chat _"Hey check this shit out"_ Then boot kicks the enemy with low HP to safety feeds the adc a kill and then finds some way to spin it into the teams fault not his. DISCLAIMER: Not all Lee players are like this but I swear 9/10 are.
